InclusionRules.name: No congenital or genetic neutropenia, leukopenia or agranulocytosis
No Normal Neutrophil count on index date
No Pancytopenia or bone marrow disorder within 7 days
No low Hemoglobin measurement in blood within 7 days
No low Hematocrit measurement in blood within 7 days
No low Platelet measurement in blood within 7 days
